resource.title: The "Bum Gun" Diplomat & Tropical AC Master Guide
resource.description: Tasteful bathroom and bedroom signage explaining bidet sprayer usage and AC settings to prevent flooding and equipment damage.
resource.painPoint: Western guests flooding bathrooms by misusing bidet sprays or freezing AC units by setting them to 16°C (causing condensation/leaks).
keyFeatures: Bidet Guide: Tasteful illustrations on proper angle and usage + "Turn off valve" reminder
AC Guide: Explaining remote symbols (Snowflake vs Drop) and the "Tropical Sweet Spot" (24-25°C)
